text: sepp blatter and Michelle platini have
been banned for eight years each it's
all to do with a payment that passed
from set Blatter to mr. Platini back in
2011 FIFA's ethics committees say it was
wrong it's mismanagement there was a
conflict of interest as a result they're
gone
Sepp Blatter is defiantly hanging on he
insists that only FIFA's 209 member
nations can remove him from office and
not the ethics committee he said he will
appeal a decision and that he sees
himself still as the right for president
Michelle 13e wanted to succeed sepp
blatter as FIFA president there's an
election on februari 26 next year but in
order to get there he has to clear his
name today's decision is a serious blow
to his chances but he too will fight on
there is a lot more to come in this FIFA
crisis the US Department of Justice have
promised more arrests there will be
further pain for world football still it
seems but they want to start reforms
they want to try and move on and try and
rebuild but of course all this is
happening in the background and while
that's going on it's very difficult to
see how they can recover
